attributes.action: Raise 40% income tax rate to earnings over £45,000
attributes.additional_details:
As of April 6 2012, any person earning £34,371, will pay 40% income tax.  This is a ridiculous amount of tax for average earners, while people earning over £150,000 will have their income tax dropped to 45%.
The treasury should review this immediately and raise the earnings level for paying 40% tax to in excess of £45,000.
